title: ‘World of Warcraft’ developers working to keep the game open to Chinese fans
description: "I’m hopeful for our ability to get them back into Azeroth," said John Hight, general manager of the Warcraft franchise at Blizzard.

title: In Call of Duty, a pacifist wins games for his team ‘single-handedly’
description: That Friendly Guy is a streamer who hit max level in 'Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II' without a single kill. It's a great way to level up, he says.

title: Mars rover digs up intriguing clues in the hunt for life beyond Earth
description: NASA's Perseverance mission has collected samples that hold life-friendly molecules “in pretty much every rock” — as well as a few geologic surprises

title: It’s not your imagination: Shopping on Amazon has gotten worse
description: Most of what you see at first on Amazon is now an ad.

title: Here’s what Twitter king Dril thinks of Musk’s chaotic reign
description: The ‘patron saint of the internet’ tells The Post he’ll never pay for verification but will learn to code if Musk offers him a job.
